## open AB stp files: tree, species composition, relative abundance, site info
```{r}
AB_stp_rel_abundance <- read.csv("C:/Users/krist/Downloads/CGCS KH/relevant_time_data/ab_gp_rel_abundance_smtree.csv")
AB_site_info <- read.csv("C:/Users/krist/Downloads/CGCS KH/relevant_time_data/ab_gp_site_info.csv")
AB_stp_species_comp <- read.csv("C:/Users/krist/Downloads/CGCS KH/relevant_time_data/ab_gp_stp_tree_species_comp.csv")
AB_stp_tree <- read.csv("C:/Users/krist/Downloads/CGCS KH/relevant_time_data/ab_gp_stp_tree.csv")


```
## check dimensions of files
```{r}
dim(AB_stp_rel_abundance)
dim(AB_site_info)
dim(AB_stp_species_comp)
dim(AB_stp_tree)

## column names
names(AB_stp_rel_abundance)
names(AB_stp_species_comp)

## merge same columns
intersect(names(AB_stp_rel_abundance), names(AB_stp_species_comp))

```

## merge AB relative abundance and species composition based on intersecting headers
```{r}
merge1 <- merge(AB_stp_rel_abundance, AB_stp_species_comp)

```

## merge merge1 with site info based on intersecting headers
```{r}
intersect(names(merge1), names(AB_site_info))
merge2 <- merge(merge1, AB_site_info)

#remove unnecessary columns
AB_stp_time_data_merged <- select(merge2, nfi_plot:meas_date, utm_n, utm_e)
```

## save as csv
```{r}
write.csv(AB_stp_time_data_merged, "AB_stp_time_data_merged.csv")
setwd()
```
